course_description: The course is designed to introduce students to various literary genres in the languages of Islamic Civilizations Studies at Emory (Arabic, Persian, Urdu, or Judeo-Arabic), selected from both classical and modern periods, according to student needs.
sections: Class Nbr: 3198, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-3:55p, Instructor: R. Cornell, Status: Open
